com.thomsonreuters.upa.examples.niprovider

Class DirectoryHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.thomsonreuters.upa.examples.niprovider.DirectoryHandler

  • public class DirectoryHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the source directory handler for the UPA NIProvider application. It provides methods for sending the source directory refresh to a consumer (e.g. ADH). Methods for setting the service name, getting the service information, and closing a source directory stream are also provided.

        public boolean isServiceUp()

        Returns:

      • sendRefresh

        public int sendRefresh(ChannelSession chnl,
                       com.thomsonreuters.upa.transport.Error error)
        Sends a source directory refresh to a channel. This consists of getting a message buffer, encoding the source directory refresh, sending the source directory refresh to the server.
        Parameters:
        chnl - The channel to send a source directory refresh to.
        error - Populated if an error occurs.

      • closeStream

        Parameters:
        chnl - The channel to send a source directory close to.
